TextLibrary.Text: Tharl of Theira
You fought well, lad.
You fought well, lad.
You fought well, lass.
You fought well, lass.
Thanks! That hammer you wield is a very effective weapon.
Thanks! That hammer you wield is a very effective weapon.
Thanks! That hammer you wield is a very effective weapon.
Thanks! That hammer you wield is a very effective weapon.
It serves us well when fighting Trolls. When your training is done, perhaps you'll join us.
It serves us well when fighting Trolls. When your training is done, perhaps you'll join us.
It serves us well when fighting Trolls. When your training is done, perhaps you'll join us.
It serves us well when fighting Trolls. When your training is done, perhaps you'll join us.
What more can you tell me about the Theiran Order?
What more can you tell me about the Theiran Order?
What more can you tell me about the Theiran Order?
What more can you tell me about the Theiran Order?
The Theirans are the protectors of northern Agaria. It takes a fierce and brutal warrior to stop the Trolls from invading, and we are proud to stand at the front line in this struggle.

Thank you. We may meet again.
Thank you. We may meet again.
Thank you. We may meet again.
Thank you. We may meet again.
